channel.title: Posts on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Hugo website

item.title: Exploring Washington, D.C. Service Requests (2016)
item.description: I’ve lived in Washington for about four years, but have lived in the D.C. metropolitan area my whole life. When looking for datasets to practice ggplot2 plotting, I came across Open Data DC, a catalog of datasets maintained by various city government agencies. I gravitated toward the Newly Updated or Added section, hoping to find a data that I haven’t read much about before. I decided on Service Request Data (i.

item.title: Welcome to the least-cool dot-cool on the Internet
item.description: I registered the seth.cool domain a couple of years ago with no project in mind – only the misguided assumptions that (1) someone else would buy it, and (2) that I am cool. I’ve decided to finally use my first-mover’s advantage to share data-related projects as I work on them. A brief background on that: As my job has evolved to include more and more data analysis, I’ve found myself spending a lot of time waiting for Excel to unfreeze respond.
